item.description:
FRIDAY JUNE 15 – Metamorphoses with Connecticut Theatre Group Pre Party Dinner and After Party
*ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT*

Metamorphoses” is based on Ovid’s classic narrative poem, which tells the transformation myths of the ancient Greeks and Romans. Using contemporary language and familiar characters, such as King Midas and his golden touch and Orpheus and Eurydice in the underworld, Zimmerman’s “Metamorphoses” explores the meaning of being alive through moments of change and the expression of universal emotions.  The focal point of the set for “Metamorphoses” is a large pool in which much of the play’s action takes place.

"...Zimmerman's lovely, deeply affecting work...shows that theater can provide not just escape but sometimes a glimpse of the divine." -- Time Magazine

"Mary Zimmerman's beautiful and deeply humane Metamorphoses...arrives in this wounded city like a small gift from the gods" -- Wall Street Journal

"With its emphases on...the transforming powers of...the imagination...the production has been reducing calloused New Yorkers to sobs." -- New York Times

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pre-Party Dinner starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm

**RECEIVE A 15% DISCOUNT ON FOOD AND DRINK AT THE PRE-PARTY WITH YOUR TICKET**

**PLUS - FREE Wine and Cheese Party at Playhouse on Park before the show**

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $32.50 at the event

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119
FREE SAFE PARKING
EXIT 43 PARK ROAD off 84 * Next to AC Petersons

Pick up your ticket before the show at the pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION *THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket before the show at the PREPARTY with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window
